entity.name: Supreme Court of the United States
entity.description: Conversation about the Supreme Court and justices

text:
@NPR Millions of Americans who have survived Covid-19 or face future infections could lose their insurance or be barred from getting coverage should Trump successfully repeal Obamacare.

Trump administration asked the supreme court late Thursday to overturn the Affordable Care Act
